mechanics.condition: You have unexpended sorcery points and desire to create a spell slot
mechanics.outcome: Transform the required number of sorcery points into one spell slot of a chosen level (up to 5th level)

mechanics.trigger: Attempting to create a spell slot
mechanics.condition: Desired spell slot level is higher than 5th level
mechanics.outcome: Cannot create a spell slot of that level

mechanics.condition: You have a spell slot created using Flexible Casting: Creating Spell Slots

description_text: You can transform unexpended sorcery points into one spell slot as a bonus action on your turn. The Creating Spell Slots table shows the cost of creating a spell slot of a given level. You can create spell slots no higher in level than 5th. Any spell slot you create with this feature vanishes when you finish a long rest.
